mapper.select: SELECT AP.*,EE.ENAME, D.DNAME,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTACHMENT AT JOIN APPROVAL A ON (AT.AID = A.AID) WHERE A.AID = AP.AID) AS ATNUM FROM APPROVAL AP JOIN LINE L ON (AP.AID=L.AID) JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (L.EID = E.EID) JOIN EMPLOYEE EE ON (AP.EID = EE.EID) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (EE.DID = D.DID) WHERE L.EID=#{eId} AND L.LSTATUS='O' AND AP.ASTATUS='I' AND ROWNUM < 6 ORDER BY AP.ASTARTDATE DESC

SELECT AP.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTACHMENT AT JOIN APPROVAL A ON (AT.AID = A.AID) WHERE A.AID = AP.AID) AS ATNUM FROM APPROVAL AP WHERE NOT AP.ASTATUS='S' AND AP.EID=#{eId} AND ROWNUM < 6 ORDER BY AP.AID DESC

SELECT E.EID, E.ENAME, R.RNAME, D.DNAME, row_number() over(partition by d.dname order by e.ename) as RNUM, A.CHANGENAME FROM EMPLOYEE E LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (E.EID = A.EID) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON(E.DID = D.DID) JOIN RANK R ON(E.RID = R.RID) WHERE STATUS='Y'
SELECT FID, EID, FILEPATH, ORIGINNAME, CHANGENAME, FILELEVEL FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE FILELEVEL = 10
SELECT E.EID, E.ENAME, R.RNAME, D.DNAME FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON(E.DID = D.DID) JOIN RANK R ON(E.RID = R.RID) WHERE E.EID=#{eId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPROVAL VALUES( SEQ_AID.NEXTVAL, #{eId}, #{aName}, #{aTitle}, #{aStatus}, SYSDATE, NULL)

INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FID, AID, FILEPATH, ORIGINNAME, CHANGENAME, FUPLOADDATE, FILELEVEL) SELECT SEQ_FID.NEXTVAL AS FID, SEQ_AID.CURRVAL AS AID, FILEPATH, ORIGINNAME, CHANGENAME, SYSDATE, 40 FROM
SELECT #{list.filePath} AS FILEPATH, #{list.originName} AS ORIGINNAME, #{list.changeName} AS CHANGENAME FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FID, AID, FILEPATH, ORIGINNAME, CHANGENAME, FUPLOADDATE, FILELEVEL) SELECT SEQ_FID.NEXTVAL AS FID, T.*, SYSDATE, 40 FROM
SELECT #{list.aId} AS AID, #{list.filePath} AS FILEPATH, #{list.originName} AS ORIGINNAME, #{list.changeName} AS CHANGENAME FROM DUAL T
mapper.select: SELECT AT.FID, AT.AID, AT.FILEPATH, AT.ORIGINNAME, AT.CHANGENAME, AT.FILELEVEL FROM ATTACHMENT AT JOIN APPROVAL A ON(A.AID = AT.AID) WHERE AT.AID=#{aId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO LINE(LINEID, AID, EID, LSTATUS, LLEVEL) SELECT SEQ_LINEID.NEXTVAL AS LINEID, SEQ_AID.CURRVAL AS AID, EID, LSTATUS, LLEVEL FROM
SELECT #{llist.leId} AS EID, #{llist.lStatus} AS LSTATUS, #{llist.lLevel} AS LLEVEL FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVAL WHERE NOT ASTATUS='S' AND EID=#{eId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVAL WHERE ASTATUS='I' AND EID=#{eId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVAL WHERE ASTATUS='Y' AND EID=#{eId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVAL WHERE ASTATUS='N' AND EID=#{eId}

SELECT AP.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTACHMENT AT JOIN APPROVAL A ON (AT.AID = A.AID) WHERE A.AID = AP.AID) AS ATNUM FROM APPROVAL AP WHERE NOT AP.ASTATUS='S' AND AP.EID=#{eId} ORDER BY ASTARTDATE DESC, AP.AID DESC
SELECT AP.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTACHMENT AT JOIN APPROVAL A ON (AT.AID = A.AID) WHERE A.AID = AP.AID) AS ATNUM FROM APPROVAL AP WHERE AP.ASTATUS='I' AND AP.EID=#{eId} ORDER BY AP.AID DESC
SELECT AP.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTACHMENT AT JOIN APPROVAL A ON (AT.AID = A.AID) WHERE A.AID = AP.AID) AS ATNUM FROM APPROVAL AP WHERE AP.ASTATUS='Y' AND AP.EID=#{eId} ORDER BY AP.AID DESC
SELECT AP.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTACHMENT AT JOIN APPROVAL A ON (AT.AID = A.AID) WHERE A.AID = AP.AID) AS ATNUM FROM APPROVAL AP WHERE AP.ASTATUS='N' AND AP.EID=#{eId} ORDER BY AP.AID DESC

SELECT COUNT(A.AID) FROM ( SELECT A.AID FROM APPROVAL A JOIN LINE L ON (A.AID = L.AID) JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON(A.EID = E.EID) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON(E.DID = D.DID) WHERE (L.EID=#{eId} OR A.EID=#{eId}) AND (A.ASTARTDATE LIKE'%'||#{search}||'%' OR A.ANAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR A.ATITLE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR E.ENAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR D.DNAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR A.AENDDATE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR A.ASTATUS LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%') GROUP BY A.AID) A

SELECT A.AID, A.EID, A.ANAME, A.ATITLE, A.ASTATUS, A.ASTARTDATE, A.AENDDATE, E.ENAME, D.DNAME FROM APPROVAL A JOIN LINE L ON (A.AID = L.AID) JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON(A.EID = E.EID) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON(E.DID = D.DID) WHERE (L.EID=#{eId} OR A.EID=#{eId}) AND (A.ASTARTDATE LIKE'%'||#{search}||'%' OR A.ANAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR A.ATITLE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR E.ENAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR D.DNAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR A.AENDDATE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR A.ASTATUS LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%') GROUP BY A.AID, A.EID, A.ANAME, A.ATITLE, A.ASTATUS, A.ASTARTDATE, A.AENDDATE, E.ENAME, D.DNAME
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVAL WHERE ASTATUS='S' AND EID=#{eId}

SELECT AP.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTACHMENT AT JOIN APPROVAL A ON (AT.AID = A.AID) WHERE A.AID = AP.AID) AS ATNUM FROM APPROVAL AP WHERE AP.ASTATUS='S' AND AP.EID=#{eId} ORDER BY AP.ASTARTDATE DESC, AP.AID DESC
SELECT A.*, E.ENAME, D.DNAME FROM APPROVAL A JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON(A.EID = E.EID) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON(E.DID = D.DID) WHERE AID=#{aId}

SELECT L.*, E.ENAME AS ENAME, R.RNAME AS RNAME, D.DNAME AS DNAME, A.CHANGENAME FROM LINE L LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (L.EID = A.EID) JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON(L.EID = E.EID) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON(E.DID = D.DID) JOIN RANK R ON(E.RID = R.RID) WHERE L.AID=#{aId} ORDER BY L.LLEVEL
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO LINE(LINEID, AID, EID, LSTATUS, LLEVEL) SELECT SEQ_LINEID.NEXTVAL AS LINEID, AID, EID, LSTATUS, LLEVEL FROM
SELECT #{llist.aId} AS AID, #{llist.leId} AS EID, #{llist.lStatus} AS LSTATUS, #{llist.lLevel} AS LLEVEL FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVAL A JOIN LINE L ON (A.AID=L.AID) WHERE L.EID=#{eId} AND L.LSTATUS='O' AND A.ASTATUS='I'

SELECT AP.*,EE.ENAME, D.DNAME,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTACHMENT AT JOIN APPROVAL A ON (AT.AID = A.AID) WHERE A.AID = AP.AID) AS ATNUM FROM APPROVAL AP JOIN LINE L ON (AP.AID=L.AID) JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (L.EID = E.EID) JOIN EMPLOYEE EE ON (AP.EID = EE.EID) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (EE.DID = D.DID) WHERE L.EID=#{eId} AND L.LSTATUS='O' AND AP.ASTATUS='I' ORDER BY AP.ASTARTDATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVAL A JOIN LINE L ON (A.AID=L.AID) JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (L.EID = E.EID) WHERE L.EID=#{eId} AND L.LLEVEL = 0 AND NOT A.ASTATUS='S'

SELECT AP.*,EE.ENAME, D.DNAME,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTACHMENT AT JOIN APPROVAL A ON (AT.AID = A.AID) WHERE A.AID = AP.AID) AS ATNUM FROM APPROVAL AP JOIN LINE L ON (AP.AID=L.AID) JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (L.EID = E.EID) JOIN EMPLOYEE EE ON (AP.EID = EE.EID) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (EE.DID = D.DID) WHERE L.EID=#{eId} AND L.LLEVEL = 0 AND NOT AP.ASTATUS='S' ORDER BY AP.ASTARTDATE DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO LINEATTACHMENT(LFID, FILEPATH, ORIGINNAME, CHANGENAME, FUPLOADDATE, FILELEVEL, FSTATUS, LINEID) SELECT SEQ_LFID.NEXTVAL AS LFID, FILEPATH, ORIGINNAME, CHANGENAME, SYSDATE, FILELEVEL, 'Y', LINEID FROM
SELECT #{list.filePath} AS FILEPATH, #{list.originName} AS ORIGINNAME, #{list.changeName} AS CHANGENAME, #{list.fileLevel} AS FILELEVEL, #{list.lineId} AS LINEID FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVAL AP JOIN LINE L ON (AP.AID=L.AID) WHERE L.EID=#{eId} AND NOT AP.ASTATUS='S' AND( L.LSTATUS='Y' OR L.LSTATUS='N')

SELECT AP.*,EE.ENAME, D.DNAME,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTACHMENT AT JOIN APPROVAL A ON (AT.AID = A.AID) WHERE A.AID = AP.AID) AS ATNUM FROM APPROVAL AP JOIN LINE L ON (AP.AID=L.AID) JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (L.EID = E.EID) JOIN EMPLOYEE EE ON (AP.EID = EE.EID) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (EE.DID = D.DID) WHERE L.EID=#{eId} AND NOT AP.ASTATUS='S' AND( L.LSTATUS='Y' OR L.LSTATUS='N') ORDER BY AP.ASTARTDATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVAL AP JOIN LINE L ON (AP.AID=L.AID) WHERE L.EID=#{eId} AND L.LSTATUS='I' AND NOT L.LLEVEL=0 AND AP.ASTATUS='I'

SELECT AP.*,EE.ENAME, D.DNAME,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTACHMENT AT JOIN APPROVAL A ON (AT.AID = A.AID) WHERE A.AID = AP.AID) AS ATNUM FROM APPROVAL AP JOIN LINE L ON (AP.AID=L.AID) JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (L.EID = E.EID) JOIN EMPLOYEE EE ON (AP.EID = EE.EID) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (EE.DID = D.DID) WHERE L.EID=#{eId} AND L.LSTATUS='I' AND NOT L.LLEVEL=0 AND AP.ASTATUS='I' ORDER BY AP.ASTARTDATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE LINE SET LSTATUS='O' WHERE (SELECT LLEVEL FROM LINE WHERE EID=#{leId} AND AID=#{aId})+1 = LLEVEL AND AID=#{aId}
UPDATE APPROVAL SET ASTATUS='Y', AENDDATE=SYSDATE WHERE (SELECT LSTATUS FROM LINE WHERE (SELECT MAX(LLEVEL) FROM LINE WHERE AID=#{aId}) = LLEVEL AND AID=#{aId}) = 'Y' AND AID=#{aId}
